name: Autonomous Worlds as Ecosystem
description: What is the state of the Autonomous Worlds ecosystem today? And what lessons can be learned from hype cycles past as the plot of this ecosystem evolves and expands?

speakers.name: David Amor
speakers.bio: Over 100 games across PC, Xbox, PlayStation and mobile. David is co-founder of UK developer Playmint, which has been building onchain games and Autonomous Worlds since 2021.

speakers.name: Hilmar Veigar PÃ©tursson
speakers.bio: CEO at CCPGames, makers of EVEOnline, EVEValkyrie, EVEGunjack, PlaySparc and lots of other cool stuff. Virtual World and Digital Economy enthusiast.

speakers.name: Rafael Morado
speakers.bio: Raf works at Lattice. He has been doing blockchain consumer applications since 2017. Before that he was making games. Previous companies: Dapper Labs, CCP and Ubisoft.
